data.name: OutputDirNotFoundReviewSettings
data.value: Specified output directory does not exist. Please review the settings page.

data.name: DatabaseNameLengthWarning
data.value: WARNING: The database name is at its maximum length. If "{0}" is the full e-book title, this should not be an issue. If the title is supposed to be longer than that, you might get an error on your Kindle (WG on firmware before 5.6). Shorten the title in Calibre or change the database name manually.

data.value: Saving raw markup to the dmp directory…

data.value: An error occurred while extracting metadata

data.value: Specified output directory does not exist.

data.name: InformationAllowsRatingOnAmazon
data.value: This info lets you rate this book on Amazon.

data.name: PenNamesRequired
data.value: Both "real" and "pen" names are required for End Actions file creation.

data.name: NoTermsAvailable
data.value: No terms were available. Do you want to continue building anyway?

data.name: SeeMobilereads
data.value: See the MobileRead forum thread (link in Settings) for more information on building aliases.

data.value: Would you like to open the file in notepad for editing?

data.value: Terms have been exported to an alias file or already exist in that file.

data.value: Character aliases read from the XML file.

data.value: Initial X-Ray built, adding locations and chapters…

data.value: An error occurred while building the X-Ray

data.value: Is it opened in another program?

data.value: An error occurred while saving the previewData file

data.value: An error occurred while creating the Start Actions

data.value: An error occurred creating the End Actions

data.value: All extras downloaded/built and none need to be overwritten, stopping here!

data.value: Built Author Profile from the existing End Actions file!

data.name: ErrorWritingAuthorProfile
data.value: An error occurred while writing the Author Profile file

data.value: Attempting to build Start and/or End Actions…

data.value: An error occurred while creating the new Author Profile, Start Actions, and/or End Actions files

data.name: CantExportFromFile
data.value: Can't export terms from an XML/TXT file…

data.name: CharacterDataSavedTo
data.value: Character data has been successfully saved to {0}

data.name: ReviewSettingsForSource
data.value: If you do not want to use {0}, you can change the data source in Settings.

data.name: AllExtrasExistNoOverwrite
data.value: All extras files already exist and none of the ""overwrite"" settings are enabled!

data.name: ErrorSavingXml
data.value: An error occurred while saving character data to XML file at {0}

data.name: UnableToFindBookOnSource
data.value: Unable to find this book on {0}. Ensure the book's title ({1}) is accurate!

data.name: VisitUrl
data.value: You may want to visit the URL to ensure it is correct.

data.name: CharacterDataExtractedSavedToPath
data.value: Character data has been successfully extracted and saved to {0}

data.name: UnableToOpenHelpDocument
data.value: Unable to open the supplied help document.

data.name: InvalidAsinShouldFix
data.value: Invalid Amazon ASIN detected: {0}! Kindle may not display an X-Ray for this e-book. Do you want to fix it? (This will modify the e-book, meaning it will need to be re-copied to your Kindle device.) THIS FEATURE IS EXPERIMENTAL AND COULD DESTROY YOUR E-BOOK!

data.name: InvalidAsinWarning
data.value: Invalid Amazon ASIN detected: {0}! Kindle may fail to display an X-Ray for this e-book. Do you wish to continue?

data.name: UpdatedAsin
data.value: ASIN updated to {0}! Make sure to copy this new version of the e-book to your Kindle device.

data.name: ShownAsinUsed
data.value: If so, the shown ASIN will be used.

data.name: FoundBookAmazon
data.value: Found the following e-book on Amazon

data.name: UnableToAutomaticallyFindAsinOnAmazon
data.value: Could not find a matching ASIN automatically for this e-book on Amazon :(

data.name: OpenChaptersFileNotepad
data.value: Would you like to open the chapters file in notepad for editing?

data.name: BuildingOldFormatNotSupported
data.value: KFX e-books cannot be used to build X-Ray files in the old format

data.name: LoadTermsFromFile
data.value: Load terms from the selected file.

data.name: DownloadFromRoentgen
data.value: Download terms from Roentgen if any are available.

data.name: UseLinkAsDataSource
data.value: Use the above link as a terms source.

data.name: ViewPreviewOfGeneratedFiles
data.value: View a preview of the generated files.

data.name: TryToBuildXRay
data.value: Try to build the X-Ray file for this e-book.

data.name: OneClickTooltip
data.value: One Click button to try to build the Start Actions, Author Profile, End Actions, and X-Ray files for this book.

data.name: OpenXmlOrTxt
data.value: Open a supported XML or TXT file containing characters and topics.

data.name: BuildExtrasTooltip
data.value: Try to build the Start Actions, Author Profile, and End Actions files for this book.

data.name: SaveRawMlTooltip
data.value: Save the RAWML (raw markup) of the e-book in the output directory so you can review it.

data.name: CreateXmlTooltip
data.value: Create an XML file containing characters and settings, or edit an existing XML file.

data.name: ExtractXRayToXml
data.value: Extract an existing X-Ray file to an XML file.

data.name: ErrorDeletingLogFiles
data.value: An error occurred while trying to delete log files.

data.name: ActionCannotBeUndone
data.value: This action can not be undone.

data.name: DeleteLogFilesConfirmation
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete all log files?

data.name: IgnoreSoftHyphensTooltip
data.value: Ignore soft hyphens (Unicode U+00AD) while searching for terms.

data.name: WriteXRayNewFormatTooltip
data.value: Write the X-Ray file in the new format for the Paperwhite 2 or Voyage with firmware version 5.6 or higher.

data.name: BuildXRayForAndroidTooltip
data.value: Changes the naming convention of the X-Ray file for the Android Kindle app.

data.name: RequiresNewFormat
data.value: Requires building in the new format.

data.name: FilesInAndroidFolder
data.value: Files will be placed in the output directory in an 'Android' folder.

data.name: GoodForFilteringQuotes
data.value: good for filtering out garbage quotes from Goodreads or other sources

data.name: SkipNoLikes
data.value: Skip notable clips with no likes.

data.name: RequiredDuringEndActionsCreation
data.value: Required during the End Actions file creation.

data.name: EnableEditTooltip
data.value: Enables the ability to edit files using Notepad during the build process.

data.name: SaveToAuthorSubdirTooltip
data.value: Save generated files to an "Author\Filename" subdirectory.

data.name: SaveToSidecarSubdirTooltip
data.value: Save generated files to a "sidecar" subdirectory based on the filename.

data.name: AutomaticallySplitAliasesTooltip
data.value: Automatically split character names into aliases. This can have undesired consequences, so use it with caution!

data.name: PlaySoundTooltip
data.value: Play a sound after the build process is complete.

data.name: DownloadAliasesTooltip
data.value: Attempt to download pre-made aliases if none exist locally yet. If "Overwrite aliases" is enabled, local aliases will be overwritten by the downloaded ones.

data.name: VisitForumTooltip
data.value: Visit the MobileRead forum for support, bug reports, or questions.

data.name: EstimatePageCountTooltip
data.value: Try to estimate the page count of the e-book if none can be found online (based on user_none's APNX generation project).

data.name: SecondarySourceTooltip
data.value: Determines from which non-Amazon source terms and metadata will be downloaded.

data.name: AmazonRegionTooltip
data.value: Default Amazon page to search. If no results are found, Amazom.com (USA) will be used.

data.name: SaveBioTooltip
data.value: If enabled, author biographies will be saved and opened in Notepad before continuing to build Author Profiles. Must be enabled for a saved biography to be loaded.

data.name: PromptAsinTooltip
data.value: Allow ASIN entry if the next or previous e-book in a series cannot be found automatically.

data.name: EditBioTooltip
data.value: If enabled, allows editing the Author's biography before it's used.

data.name: AutoBuildAuthorProfileTooltip
data.value: When set, the Author Profile will be built using a downloaded End Actions file instead of scraping Amazon, if one is available.

data.name: IncludeTopicsTooltip
data.value: When downloading terms, include any that are non-characters (topics, locations, etc).

data.name: BuildFromEndActions
data.value: Build from downloaded End Actions when one is available

data.name: FilesDownloadedInSelectedLanguage
data.value: Files will be downloaded in the language of the selected region, when possible.

data.name: PreBuiltSettingsDescription
data.value: When these settings are enabled, pre-built versions of the files will be downloaded if they are available. Requires a valid ASIN.

data.name: RestartRequired
data.value: Application must be restarted for changes to take effect!
